sourcesContent:
<template>
    <v-container>
        <v-row>
            <v-col>
                <v-card>
                    <v-card-title>회원 상세 정보</v-card-title>
                    <v-card-text>
                        <v-row>
                            <v-col cols="12" md="6">
                                <v-text-field
                                    label="ID"
                                    :value="member.id"
                                    readonly
                                />
                            </v-col>
                            <v-col cols="12" md="6">
                                <v-text-field
                                    label="이름"
                                    :value="member.name"
                                    readonly
                                />
                            </v-col>
                            <v-col cols="12" md="6">
                                <v-text-field
                                    label="이메일"
                                    :value="member.email"
                                    readonly
                                />
                            </v-col>
                            <v-col cols="12" md="6">
                                <v-text-field
                                    label="권한"
                                    :value="member.role"
                                    readonly
                                />
                            </v-col>
                        </v-row>
                    </v-card-text>
                    <v-card-actions>
                        <v-btn @click="goBack">목록으로</v-btn>
                    </v-card-actions>
                </v-card>
            </v-col>
        </v-row>
    </v-container>
</template>

<script>
import axios from 'axios';
import { getResultData, getErrorMessage } from '@/utils/commonDataHandler';

// 화면간에 매개변수를 넘길떄 사용하는 변수값을 props라고 불림.
export default {
    props : {'isMyPage': 'memberId'},
    data() {
        return {
            member: {
                id: '',
                name: '',
                email: '',
                role: ''
            }
        }
    },
    async created() {
        ㅅ교
        
        await this.getMemberDetail();
    },
    methods: {
        async getMemberDetail() {
            try {
                const accessToken = localStorage.getItem('accessToken');
                const memberId = this.$route.params.id;
                
                const response = await axios.get(
                    `${process.env.VUE_APP_API_BASE_URL}/member/detail/${memberId}`,
                    {
                        headers: {
                            Authorization: `Bearer ${accessToken}`
                        }
                    }
                );
                
                this.member = getResultData(response);
            } catch (error) {
                if (error.response?.status === 401) {
                    alert('관리자 권한이 필요합니다.');
                    this.$router.push('/member/login');
                } else if (error.response?.status === 403) {
                    alert('접근 권한이 없습니다.');
                    this.$router.push('/member/list');
                } else {
                    alert(getErrorMessage(error));
                }
            }
        },
        goBack() {
            this.$router.push('/member/list');
        }
    }
}
</script>
